thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Rescue workers pull bodies out of plane wreckage in Nepal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Rescue workers pull bodies out of plane wreckage in Nepal
text:
KATHMANDU, (Reuters) - Rescue workers recovered badly burnt bodies from the wreckage of a Bangladeshi aircraft that crashed while coming in to land at Nepalâ€™s Kathmandu airport on Monday, a Reuters witness said.
There were 71 people on board the plane and 17 had been rescued, an airport official said earlier. The number of dead and injured was not known.
A Reuters photographer said he could see bodies covered in cloth laid out near the tarmac of the airport.
Reporting by Navesh Chitrakar; Writing by Sanjeev Miglani; Editing by Robert Birsel
